//comment test
func num add(num a,num b) 
        return a + b
end

//comment test
//multiple func test
func num sub(num c,num d)
        return c - d
end

//void func test
func println(string word)
        print(word + "\n")
end
//func overloading test
func println(num word)
        print(word + "\n")
end

//func string test
func string strcat(string pre, string suf)
        return pre + suf
end

main()
num a = 5 + 5
num b = 5 * 5

print(a)
print("\n")
println(b)

//string literal and func test
string name = "eric"
string word = "hello"
string words = strcat(word, name)
print(words + "\n")

//function test
b = add(a, b)
print(b)
print("\n")

//function test
b = sub(b, a)
print(b)
print("\n")

//boolean test
bool truebool = true
print(truebool)
print("\n")

//boolean expression test
truebool = true || false
print(truebool)
print(true || false)
print("\n")
if(!truebool)
        println("if statement working")
else
        println("else statement also working")
end
num i = 0
while(i < 10)
        if(i < 9)
                print(i)
        else
                println(i)
        end
        i = i + 1
end
for(num k = 0; k < 10; ++k)
        print(k)
        b = add(k, k)
        print(b)
end

print("\n")
for(num j = 0; j < 10; j++)
        if(j == 5)
                b = j
                break
        end
end
println(b)
end
